# modelNumber

**Instance Property**

The device model number.

## Declaration

```swift
var modelNumber: (UInt8, UInt8)
```

## Discussion

This value is 2 bytes long.

## Configuring Device Identification

- **manufacturer**: The MIDI System Exclusive (SysEx) ID of the device manufacturer.
- **family**: The group of familes to which the device belongs.
- **revisionLevel**: The revision number of the device model number.
- **reserved**: A reserved field whose value is always zero.
